scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true });"
scripts.build:prepare:db: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('apiService.ts.php.txt', 'services/apiService.ts'); console.log('Switched to PHP/DB-based apiService for build.');"
scripts.build:prepare:csv: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('apiService.ts.csv.txt', 'services/apiService.ts'); console.log('Switched to CSV-based apiService for build.');"
scripts.build:prepare:footer:prod: node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync('components/Footer.tsx.prod.txt', 'components/Footer.tsx'); console.log('Switched to Production Footer for build.');"
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prepare:db && npm run build:prepare:footer:prod && npm run build:js && npm run copy:html && npm run prepare:api && npm run prepare:static && npm run build:cleanup
scripts.build:csv: npm run clean && npm run build:prepare:csv && npm run build:js && npm run copy:html && npm run prepare:static
